name: FOOT UNSTOPPING BALL
description:
FOOT UNSTOPPING BALL is a two player football game made for the mini game jam 84 : sport.

thimathtennakoon

Control: The players use one keyboard to move (player one use {WASD keys} And   player two use {arrow keys} to move and hit the football).

Obstacle: The obstacle are the UNSTOPPING spawn colon balls which is in black          color.

Goal: You should put the white ball into the neither goal to score marks within 50 seconds. Players should put the ball to score marks.

Win: The player who score highest marks will be the winner

Have fun playing the game and pleases send me feedbacks
